name: Cleaner Facebook (2014 theme/ClearType fonts)
description: Facebook redesign. Gone are related pages, the entire right column. The timeline is expanded and all fonts are beautiful, rendered with ClearType.
additional_info: Compatibility: For Facebook design active on December 28, 2014. Update: On December 28, 2014, the author decided that the white from the sidebar should be removed. Now, the bar looks a bit more like Facebook's default. This behavior is intended and the style screenshot was updated.
